title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Ah mind the sun comin up, soaking Johnny's front roomin a wreckin light that relentlessly blasted all our mortal decay and foiblesback at us. Ah goat up, then Matty, Spud and me met the rest ay the boysin the Roseburn Bar, early doors before the derby, then a bunch ay uswent up Haymarket n hit some mair boozers. The two sets ay fans weregiein each other aw the big threat shite gaun doon the road, but the polisline stayed firm between them.The game was a grunting, sweating goallessdraw.
